subject: Soccer
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Hispanic-Americans
Discrimination
Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Dan Calichman and Ted Chronopoulos charge in a lawsuit that they were fired by an M.L.S. club, Chivas USA, because they are not Latino.
snippet: Dan Calichman and Ted Chronopoulos charge in a lawsuit that they were fired by an M.L.S. club, Chivas USA, because they are not Latino.
